SELECT i.*, u.user_name, u.user_avatar, CASE WHEN i.content_type = 'gourmet' THEN g.title WHEN i.content_type = 'content_net' THEN cn.title ELSE NULL END AS content_title, CASE WHEN i.content_type = 'gourmet' THEN g.cover WHEN i.content_type = 'content_net' THEN cn.cover ELSE NULL END AS content_cover FROM interaction i LEFT JOIN user u ON i.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN gourmet g ON i.content_id = g.id AND i.content_type = 'gourmet' LEFT JOIN content_net cn ON i.content_id = cn.id AND i.content_type = 'content_net' WHERE i.type = #{type} AND i.user_id != #{userId} AND ( EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM gourmet g2 WHERE g2.id = i.content_id AND g2.user_id = #{userId} AND i.content_type = 'gourmet' ) OR EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM content_net cn2 WHERE cn2.id = i.content_id AND cn2.user_id = #{userId} AND i.content_type = 'content_net' ) ) ORDER BY i.create_time DESC
LIMIT #{current},#{size}

SELECT i.user_id, i.content_id, ( IFNULL(view_cnt.count, 0) * 0.1 + IFNULL(upvote_flag.flag, 0) * 2 + IFNULL(collect_flag.flag, 0) * 3 + IFNULL(i.score, 0) * 2 ) AS score, IFNULL(view_cnt.count, 0) AS view_count, IFNULL(upvote_flag.flag, 0) AS upvote_flag, IFNULL(collect_flag.flag, 0) AS collect_flag, i.score AS rating_score, g.category_id FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT user_id, content_id, score FROM interaction WHERE content_type = 'gourmet' ) i LEFT JOIN gourmet g ON i.content_id = g.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT user_id, content_id, COUNT(*) AS count FROM interaction WHERE type = 3 AND content_type = 'gourmet' GROUP BY user_id, content_id ) view_cnt ON i.user_id = view_cnt.user_id AND i.content_id = view_cnt.content_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT user_id, content_id, 1 AS flag FROM interaction WHERE type = 1 AND content_type = 'gourmet' ) upvote_flag ON i.user_id = upvote_flag.user_id AND i.content_id = upvote_flag.content_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT user_id, content_id, 1 AS flag FROM interaction WHERE type = 2 AND content_type = 'gourmet' ) collect_flag ON i.user_id = collect_flag.user_id AND i.content_id = collect_flag.content_id WHERE g.id IS NOT NULL

SELECT i.user_id, i.content_id, ( IFNULL(view_cnt.count, 0) * 0.1 + IFNULL(upvote_flag.flag, 0) * 2 + IFNULL(collect_flag.flag, 0) * 3 + IFNULL(i.score, 0) * 2 ) AS score, IFNULL(view_cnt.count, 0) AS view_count, IFNULL(upvote_flag.flag, 0) AS upvote_flag, IFNULL(collect_flag.flag, 0) AS collect_flag, i.score AS rating_score, g.category_id FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT user_id, content_id, score FROM interaction WHERE content_type = 'gourmet' AND user_id = #{userId} ) i LEFT JOIN gourmet g ON i.content_id = g.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT user_id, content_id, COUNT(*) AS count FROM interaction WHERE type = 3 AND content_type = 'gourmet' AND user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY user_id, content_id ) view_cnt ON i.user_id = view_cnt.user_id AND i.content_id = view_cnt.content_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT user_id, content_id, 1 AS flag FROM interaction WHERE type = 1 AND content_type = 'gourmet' AND user_id = #{userId} ) upvote_flag ON i.user_id = upvote_flag.user_id AND i.content_id = upvote_flag.content_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT user_id, content_id, 1 AS flag FROM interaction WHERE type = 2 AND content_type = 'gourmet' AND user_id = #{userId} ) collect_flag ON i.user_id = collect_flag.user_id AND i.content_id = collect_flag.content_id WHERE g.id IS NOT NULL
